title: How to Complete Puzzle 1 3 in Scribblenauts

steps.headline: Look at the given hint: "Use the ramp to beat his distance"
Tap on the notebook in the right hand corner.
Tap on the letters to write solutions.
Drag the vehicle to Max so he can use it.
steps.description: Drag the stylus down the hill so Max flies over the guy.

steps.headline: Get the starite to complete the level.

text:
Look at the given hint: "Use the ramp to beat his distance"  Tap on the notebook in the right hand corner.  Tap on the letters to write solutions. Motorcycle
Bike
Car
Truck
Skateboard Drag the vehicle to Max so he can use it. Drag the stylus down the hill so Max flies over the guy. Get the starite to complete the level.
